description: The world is at an end, and you have 30 seconds to save it!
minimum_requirements: Minimum OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3                 Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or equivalent                 Memory: 1GB RAM                 Hard Disk Space: 2 GB (includes Direct X files)                                  Video Card: GeForce FX 5700 or equivalent card with 256MB VRAM                 DirectXÂ®: 9.0c                 Sound: DirectX 9 compliant audio card                 Additional: Gamepad or controller recommended

reviews.review_text: More a puzzle game than an RPG. Balance speed vs. grinding vs. money management to solve each stage, contains 99% of the content of all other versions of the game... probably the 'ultimate' variant. A crazy game which has some silly moments and a barrage of replay value given the multiple awards, unlocks, and branches each stage might come complete with.  A speedy game deserves an equally-quick review, no?
